document.full_text: flyers goalie brian boucher was given the hook in the second period, making this the sixth of 10 playoff games in which a flyers starting goalie did not finish the game.
document.title: bruins 5, flyers 1: as goaltending falters, flyers find themselves in a familiar hole
lines_and_colors: flyers goalie brian boucher was given the hook in the second period, making this the sixth of 10 playoff games in which a flyers starting goalie did not finish the game.
